function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The potential for incomplete viral inactivation due to the saturation of the 'target' with UV photons","Impact":"Increased risk of viral survival and propagation in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implement measures to monitor UV dosage and saturation levels to ensure thorough inactivation","Technologies":"UV dosimeters and sensors for monitoring UV dosage levels","People":"Occupants and visitors in the built environment","Owner":"Building managers and maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inaccurate prediction of virus behavior due to unknown Z values for specific viral species","Impact":"Difficulty in effectively planning and implementing UV-C disinfection strategies","Mitigation":"Research and determine Z values for specific viral species to improve predictive accuracy","Technologies":"Viral susceptibility testing and UV inactivation studies","People":"Virologists, research scientists, and public health experts","Owner":"Health organizations and research institutions"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of UV inactivation plots for some viral species leading to ineffective disinfection strategies","Impact":"Risk of inadequate viral inactivation and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Ensure comprehensive understanding of viral species-specific UV inactivation behavior and seek expert guidance","Technologies":"UV inactivation studies and data analysis","People":"Public health officials, building managers, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Health organizations and infectious disease experts"}]}
